message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $140. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to consider $130?

I understand you're still hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to meet your price. I can sell the product to you for $135. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Would you be willing to meet me at $132.50?

I've made a significant concession already, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I can sell the product to you for $137.50. This is getting close to my minimum, so I hope we can finalize the deal.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $132.50 is a fair price. Would you be willing to accept that?
